title: Unable to accept afk check when finding a match?
body: I've been trying to play a match with a friend who has leaverbuster, and the ready check came up, and I clicked accept, but it didn't render it so we ended up having to go through forty minutes of time for nothing, and it's really frustrating.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may have a poor connection to our matchmaking servers, causing your inability to reach champ select. I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure there aren't any conflicting network settings on your local end.

Please let me know if this resolved your issues.
